text: Asphyxia is a 2017 Iranian neo-noir film written, produced and directed by Fereydoun Jeyrani and starring Navid Mohammadzadeh, Elnaz Shakerdoust, Mahaya Petrosian and Pardis Ahmadieh. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Navid Mohammadzadeh as Masoud Sazgar *Elnaz Shakerdoust as Sahra Mashreghi *Mahaya Petrossian as Zohre *Pardis Ahmadieh as Nasim Sazgar *Poulad Kimiaei as Mansour Sazgar *Parviz Poorhosseini *Ehsan Amani as Zohre's Husband *Asadollah Yekta as Doctor ==References== ==External links== * Category:Iranian films Category:Iranian drama films
title: Asphyxia (film)
